trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Marietta
There were no other sightings in Marietta on or around May 1st 2000
divs: sighting detailsa woman awoke sometime after 3 am, 5\1\00, and immediately notice a greyoval-shaped object hovering above her skylight. bright red and white lights werearrayed across the bottom. within seconds the object descended, rotating slowlyas it proceeded to within such proximity of the roof that its exterior filledthe skylight. [its diameter was thereafter adjudged to be about 25 feet.] alongthe way it tilted radically, revealing triangular shaped lights on its upperportion. the witness noticed a swishing sound associated with the object. shewas either paralyzed in fear or otherwise unable to awaken her husband next toher in the bed. momentarily the object rose and again and moved away. the eventduration was under one minute. afterward, the woman continued to be toofrightened to wake her husband until morning.
Summary: Oval disc hovers over bedroom skylight in GA.
